talents.name: Accustomed to Crowds
effects: Crowds do not count as Difficult Terrain for hivers
When Running or Charging through a dense crowd, hivers take no penalty to the Agility Test to keep their feet

talents.name: Basic Weapon Training (SP)
effects: No penalty to use these weapons

talents.name: Basic Weapon Training (Las)
effects: No penalty to use these weapons

talents.name: Caves of Steel
effects: Hivers treat the Tech-Use (Int) skill as a Basic Skill

talents.name: Hivebound
effects: Hivers take a –10 penalty to all Survival (Int) Tests
While out of a “proper hab” (e.g. places without manufactured goods, solid ceilings and electrical power) the hiver takes a –5 penalty to all Intelligence Tests

talents.name: Melee Weapon Training (Primitive)
effects: No penalty to use these weapons

talents.name: Pistol Training (Las)
effects: No penalty to use these weapons

talents.name: Quick Draw
effects: You are quick to the draw, able to have a weapon in your hand and ready for combat in the blink of an eye
You can Ready as a Free Action

talents.name: Rapid Reload
effects: You have spent so long practising weapons drills that you can reload a gun in an instant
All reload times are reduced by half (round down) – so a Half Action reload becomes a Free Action, a Full Action reload becomes a Half Action and so on

talents.name: Takedown
effects: You are skilled at taking an opponent alive
As a Half Action you may declare that you are attempting to Takedown an opponent before Testing Weapon Skill
If you hit and do at least 1 point of Damage, this damage is ignored and your opponent must make a Toughness Test of be Stunned for one Round

talents.name: Wary
effects: All hivers gain a +1 bonus to Initiative rolls
